understanding.developer_understanding_on_unclear_metho: The unclear code is related to the constructor method InstantGI, which initializes variables using values from the Options object.
understanding.developer_understanding_on_unclear_code_: The unclear code is using the Options object to retrieve configuration values for variables like numPhotons, numSets, c, numBias, and virtualLights. The configuration values are retrieved using specific keys like 'gi.igi.samples', 'gi.igi.sets', 'gi.igi.c', 'gi.igi.bias_samples'.

config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'gi.igi.samples' is used in the code to set the number of photons to be used for instant global illumination. It is retrieved from the 'Options' object passed to the 'InstantGI' constructor.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the 'gi.igi.samples' configuration depends on when the 'InstantGI' constructor is called in the system. It will be triggered whenever an instance of 'InstantGI' is created with the 'Options' object containing this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'gi.igi.samples' configuration option is significant as it determines the number of photons used for global illumination. A higher value may result in more accurate lighting but also increase computational cost.
